job_title: .NET Full Stack Developer with Angular (Lead/Independent Contributor)
jd: From: Jayashree Biswal, Vyzeinc jbiswal@vyzeinc.com Reply to: jbiswal@vyzeinc.com Job Title: .NET Full Stack Developer with Angular (Lead/Independent Contributor)Location: McKinney, TX (local only) Work Status: Hybrid – 3 Days OnsiteJob Type: 6-Month Contract to Hire)Visa: USC & GC OnlyInterview Process: 2 WebEx interviews followed by a mandatory face-to-face interview. Linkedin Must Job Overview:We are looking for an experienced .NET FullStack Developer with strong C# API expertise and front-end experience in Angular. The ideal candidate will be a Lead/Independent Contributor who can work confidently, take ownership of tasks, and resolve issues independently. This role requires someone who can lead through challenges and make proactive decisions to deliver solutions.Key Responsibilities:Take the lead in designing, developing, and maintaining scalable C# APIs and Angular front-end solutions.Confidently handle issues that arise and lead resolutions independently without supervision.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and provide technical solutions.Own the development process end-to-end, ensuring quality, performance, and maintainability.Provide updates and detailed insights into project work during meetings.Interview Expectations:The client is looking for someone who can confidently explain what they did, how they did it, and when it was done—providing real-world examples rather than theoretical answers.Candidates should be prepared to give specific details about past projects, including the challenges faced and the solutions delivered.Straightforward communication is key—candidates should focus on clearly outlining their contributions and impact on previous projects.Required Skills & Experience:15-20 + years of experience in C# development with .NET Core and ASP.NET.Proven track record of leading projects or working as an independent contributor in previous roles.Expertise in RESTful API development and Angular front-end development.Strong understanding of API lifecycle management, security (OAuth2, JWT), and performance optimization.Experience in cloud environments, particularly Azure, and working with Azure DevOps CI/CD pipelines.Excellent communication skills, with the ability to explain technical solutions clearly and confidently.Additional Experience (Preferred):Experience with Docker/Kubernetes for microservices.Familiarity with Azure Okta Integrations.Previous financial services or banking industry experience is a plus.
